items.title: Maryland speeders to pay more, D.C. changes health care under new laws
items.description: News laws that take effect Oct. 1 include a tiered speeding ticket system in Maryland and a pay increase for police officers in Washington, D.C.

items.title: Government shutdown begins after federal funding expires
items.description: The lapse in finances means crucial government functions will shutter until lawmakers approve more money.
